description: Numbers with 1 zero in Fibonacci numbers mod m.
comments: Conjecture: m is on this list iff m is an odd number all of whose factors are on this list or m is 2 or 4 times such an odd number.A001176(a(n)) = A128924(a(n),1) = 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 16 2014
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a053031 n = a053031_list !! (n-1)a053031_list = filter ((== 1) . a001176) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 16 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 23 2000
